casebody.data:
James Timothy SPEARS, Appellant-Defendant,
v.
STATE of Indiana, Appellee-Plaintiff. Court of Appeals Case No. 40A04-1708-CR-2022 Court of Appeals of Indiana. Filed June 26, 2018

DISPOSITION OF CASE BY UNPUBLISHED MEMORANDUM DECISION

PYLE, J., Concurs.
